title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 8001.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 8001.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 87. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 87 between the Albany-Greene county
line and the Albany-Saratoga county line in the City of Albany, Villages of

Colonie and Ravena, and Towns of Colonie, Guilderland, Bethlehem and

Coeymans. (b) Fuller Road
alternate. The northbound and southbound roadways of the Fuller Road alternate
arterial highway between US Route 20 and IR 87 in the Town of

Guilderland. (c) IR 90. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of IR 90 between the Schenectady-Albany county
line and the Albany-Rensselaer county line in the City of Albany and Towns of

Guilderland and Colonie. (d) IR
787. The northbound and southbound roadways of IR 787 between Thruway exit 23
and the Albany-Rensselaer county line in the Cities of Albany and Watervliet, Villages of Menands and Green Island, and Town of Colonie. (e) IR 890. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of IR 890 between the Albany-Schenectady county line and Thruway exit
25 in the Towns of Guilderland and Colonie. (f) Route 5. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 5 between the Schenectady-Albany county line and IR 87 in the

Town of Colonie and Village of Colonie. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง
8001.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
